inclusion.criterion: Post-menopausal women aged 50-75 years at Visit 1
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Vertebral bone mineral density at least 2.5 S.D. below the mean of young normals.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have at least 2 measurable contiguous vertebral bodies in the lumbar region, L1-L4.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Ability and willingness to give informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of 5 or more vertebral fractures
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Presence of significant cardiac disease as determined by history, physical examination and laboratory screens.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 34-year-old woman from Jordan with general and non-specific bones and joints pain. Her past medical and drug history are unremarkable.
